div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Japanese Encephalitis vaccine according to the defined schedule

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Japanese Encephalitis - No Doses
description: Provide Japanese Encephalitis immunizations – using the "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 2 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 2 dose scheme
"Country is administering Inactivated Vero cell-derived antigen" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 2 dose scheme
"Country recognizes JE as a health priority" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Japanese Encephalitis - 2nd dose
description: Provide Japanese Encephalitis immunizations – using the "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization – Inactivated Vero cell-derived" schedule (2 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme
"Type of last JE dose" = "Inactivated Vero cell-derived"
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme
"Country recognizes JE as a health priority" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Japanese Encephalitis - No Doses
description: Provide Japanese Encephalitis immunizations – using the "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 1 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 1 dose scheme
"Country is administering Live attentuated antigen" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 1 dose scheme
"Country recognizes JE as a health priority" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 1 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 1 dose scheme

blockquote.p: title: Immunize Patient for Japanese Encephalitis - No Doses
description: Provide Japanese Encephalitis immunizations – using the "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

tr.td: Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 1 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 1 dose scheme
"Country is administering Live recombinant antigen" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 1 dose scheme
"Country recognizes JE as a health priority" = TRUE
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 1 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 1 dose scheme
